Temperatura din dormitor s-a modificat in felul urmator: 
[10.0, 10.1, 10.19, 10.3, 10.39, 10.49, 10.59, 10.69, 10.79, 10.89, 10.99, 11.09, 11.19, 11.29, 11.39, 11.49, 11.59, 11.69, 11.79, 11.89, 11.99, 12.09, 12.19, 12.29, 12.39, 12.49, 12.59, 12.69, 12.79, 12.89, 12.99, 13.09, 13.19, 13.29, 13.39, 13.49, 13.59, 13.69, 13.79, 13.89, 13.99, 14.09, 14.19, 14.29, 14.39, 14.49, 14.59, 14.69, 14.79, 14.89, 14.99, 15.09, 15.19, 15.29, 15.39, 15.49, 15.59, 15.69, 15.79, 15.89, 15.99, 16.09, 16.19, 16.29, 16.39, 16.49, 16.59, 16.69, 16.79, 16.89, 16.99, 17.09, 17.19, 17.29, 17.39, 17.5, 17.6, 17.7, 17.8, 17.9, 18.0, 18.1, 18.2, 18.3, 18.4, 18.5, 18.6, 18.7, 18.8, 18.9, 19.0, 19.1, 19.2, 19.3, 19.4, 19.5, 19.6, 19.7, 19.8, 19.9, 19.89, 19.79, 19.69, 19.59, 19.49, 19.39, 19.29, 19.19, 19.09, 18.99, 18.89, 18.79, 18.69, 18.59, 18.49, 18.39, 18.29, 18.19, 18.09, 17.99, 17.89, 17.79, 17.69, 17.59, 17.49, 17.39, 17.29, 17.19, 17.09, 16.99, 16.89, 16.79, 16.69, 16.59, 16.49, 16.39, 16.29, 16.19, 16.09, 15.99, 15.89, 15.79, 15.69, 15.59, 15.49, 15.39, 15.29, 15.19, 15.09, 14.99, 14.89, 14.79, 14.69, 14.59, 14.59, 14.59, 14.59, 14.59]
